todolist

Class MainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • todolist.MainApp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainAppStub

    public class MainApp
extends javafx.application.Application
    MainApp is the main running class for the application. It provides the user with the graphical user interface to control the application.
    Author:
    Huang Lie Jun (A0123994W)
    See Also:
    Application
